img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in a battle with a boss named "Black Wind King." The setting appears to be a forested area with fallen leaves and some fire-lit areas in the background. The player character is in a combat stance, facing a swirling dark energy in the center of the scene. On-screen text at the bottom reads, "I am the Black Wind!" indicating a dialogue or declaration from the boss. The user interface displays various icons and a health bar, suggesting the player is in the midst of an active battle.
